traits.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While Jade Tigress is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Force Strike
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of Jade Tigress's next turn.

actions.name: Poisoned Dart
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage plus 7 (3d4 damage) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}.

actions.name: Heal Self (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Jade Tigress regains {@dice 2d8 + 2} hit points, and all levels of {@condition exhaustion} end on her.
